semantic_description: Surface the database name and stored-procedure name as OpenTelemetry span attributes so that Jaeger traces display them for CLM and eSign services.

attributes_to_add.name: db.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the value of the 'storedProcedureName' variable used when invoking the SQL stored procedure

attributes_to_add.name: db.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the value obtained from 'sqlConnection.Database' at the time of the call
